Reviews.Content: family stayed karate tournament staff courteous friendly gone beyond normal expectations hotel clean free breakfast buffet hot cold options staff beyond staff offered bring customer waffle table cooked stand wait little stay worthwhile hotel indoor pool swimming toys kids diving sticks beach ball etc kids enjoyed stay
